answers.answer: Ill be 28 weeks this sunday.  Im just tired mostly and so huge already but its not miserable yet maybe 35 weeks and ill be.  I know for sure I want go to 40 weeks maybe 37 or 38 and get a c section so im counting and relieved by that :)
Congrats! I'm 28 weeks and 4 days! :). I'm feeling really good. Don't Really feel pregnant except for my belly is growing,  baby is kicking like crazy and heart burn.  How are you feeling?  :)
Ill be 28 weeks tomorrow!! Im feeling good ALOT acid reflex lol
I'm 28 weeks Saturday and it starting to wear on me with these restless nights but I'm holding.
I'll be 28 weeks this Saturday ! (: Im pretty excited I feel my baby girl move a lot & a lot each day.  The only thing that ***** is I can never find a comfortable position sleeping .
I am also 28 weeks.. Feeling pretty good.. Just lost most of my energy though.. Baby boy is moving a lot more now too
Well I'm 29wks and its taking foreverrrrrrr I'm super tired already iv gained 25lbs my body ain't use to holding so much weight lol and more to come

I'm 28 weeks well I'll be 29 on Saturday and I'm sooo ready to have this baby. I still sometimes throw up and now I'm starting to cramp a little I also have gestational diabetes too sooo I'm tired too..come on November 22nd lol

question: Iam sooo excited! This pregnancy is flying by! 12 weeks or less to go! :) anyone else 28 weeks? How are you feeling? What are your symptoms?
title: 28 weeks today!
